hero.title: Hi, I'm Nicolas
hero.skills: JavaScript, TypeScript, React.js, Next.js, Nest.js, Express.js, Node.js, Docker, Postgress, Mysql and more.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a Fullstack Developer with over 4 years of experience in Web and Software Development. My expertise spans both frontend and backend technologies. On the frontend, I specialize in React.js, Next.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS, and Material UI. On the backend, I have extensive experience with Node.js, Express.js, NestJS, GraphQL, REST APIs, Laravel, and Ruby on Rails. For databases, I work with MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL. Additionally, I am skilled in DevOps and tools such as Docker, Git, CI/CD, GitHub Actions, Linux, and AWS. Based in Neuquén, Argentina, I am passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions and am open to remote opportunities.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.sub_title: I am here to help you

footer.description: I am <mark>Nicolas Fernandez</mark>, a Fullstack Developer with 4+ years of experience in Web and Software Development. Specializing in <mark>JavaScript</mark>, <mark>TypeScript</mark>, <mark>React.js</mark>, <mark>Next.js</mark>, <mark>Nest.js</mark>, <mark>Express.js</mark>, <mark>Node.js</mark>, <mark>Postgress</mark>, <mark>Mysql</mark> and Devops practices such <mark>Docker</mark> and <mark>Github Actions</mark>. Currently based in Neuquén, Argentina, and open to remote projects. I invite you to learn more about my skills, experience, and professional journey.
